oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Affadavit of Civil War service for Pvt. Michael Wyrick
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This affadavit from the adjutant general's office of the Ohio affirms that Michael Wyrick enrolled as a private in Co. G, 68th Ohio Vol. Inf., USA, at Hamar, Ohio, on Feb. 15, 1864. He mustered into service at Toledo, Ohio, for 3 years. He was sent to the hospital in Cincinnati, Ohio on May 31, 1865 and discharged on June 26, 1865 in Washington, D. C.
